00023 <div id="main" class="clearfix">
00024     <h1>Standard Elements</h1>  
00025     <?php
00026         $elements = Boo_Html::getStandardElements();
00027         
00028         foreach ($elements as $key => $value) {
00029             $className = 'Boo_Html_' . ucfirst($value);
00030             echo "<h2>{$className}</h2>\n";
00031             
00032             $tmp = new $className;
00033             $tmp->setAttr('name', $value);
00034             $tmp->setAttr('id', $value);
00035             $text = htmlspecialchars($tmp->html());
00036             echo "<textarea rows=\"2\" cols=\"100\">{$text}</textarea>\n";
00037         }
00038     ?>
00039
